org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi

Class Osgi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi.Osgi

  • public final class Osgi
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static methods for integration with OSGi.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Osgi() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Request<Root> contextCopyReq(Root _root)
      Returns a request to create a copy of a root bound to the factory locator that can deserialize it.

      Returns a filter for locating the factory locator service of another bundle.
      static org.osgi.framework.BundleContext getBundleContext(JAContext _jaContext)
      Returns the BundleContext saved in the bundleContext property of a JAContext.
      static java.lang.String getNiceVersion(org.osgi.framework.Version version)
      Returns the version in the form major.minor.micro or major.minor.micro-qualifier.

      Returns the OsgiFactoryLocator associated with a mailbox factory.

      • getBundleContext

        public static org.osgi.framework.BundleContext getBundleContext(JAContext _jaContext)
        Returns the BundleContext saved in the bundleContext property of a JAContext.
        Parameters:
        _jaContext - The mailbox factory.
        Returns:
        The BundleContext.

      • getNiceVersion

        public static java.lang.String getNiceVersion(org.osgi.framework.Version version)
        Returns the version in the form major.minor.micro or major.minor.micro-qualifier. This is in contrast to Version.toString, which uses a . rather than a - with a qualifier.
        Parameters:
        version - The version.
        Returns:
        The formatted version.

      • getOsgiFactoryLocator

        Returns:
        The OsgiFactoryLocator.

      • factoryLocatorFilter

        public static org.osgi.framework.Filter factoryLocatorFilter(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext _bundleContext,
                                             java.lang.String _bundleName,
                                             java.lang.String _niceVersion)
                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a filter for locating the factory locator service of another bundle.
        Parameters:
        _bundleContext - The current bundle context.
        _bundleName - The symbolic name of the bundle of the desired factory locator service.
        _niceVersion - The nice form of the version of the bundle of the desired factory locator service.
        Returns:
        The filter.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • contextCopyReq

        public static Request<Root> contextCopyReq(Root _root)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a request to create a copy of a root bound to the factory locator that can deserialize it.
        Parameters:
        _root - The root.
        Returns:
        A copy of the root with the appropriate mailbox.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
